Class SpatialTransformRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.api.SpatialTransformRegistry
public final class SpatialTransformRegistry extends Object
Registry for resolving coordinate transforms for spatial-capable layers.

Platform-independent and headless-certified. No AWT/Swing dependencies.

Since:
1.7.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
